contact_exists[source]

contact_exists(value, property='email', operator='EQ', hapikey=None)

Check if a contact exists.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# example usage
does_exist = contact_exists('andrewm4894@gmail.com', hapikey=hapikey)
does_exist

True
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# tests

assert contact_exists('andrewm4894@gmail.com', hapikey=hapikey) == True
{% endraw %}
